The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 October is 441,528 (784.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 October, there were 54,853 new confirmed cases (97.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 September, there were 35,127 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 56% (19726 extra cases).
